from collections import namedtuple, OrderedDict

n = int(input())
cols = input().split(' ')

Student = namedtuple('Student', cols)
students = [Student(*input().split()) for _ in range(n)]

print("{:.2f}".format(sum(float(s.MARKS) for s in students) / n))

from collections import namedtuple

N = int(input())
cols = input().split()

Student = namedtuple('Student', cols)
students = [Student(*input().split()) for _ in range(N)]

print("{:.2f}".format(sum(float(s.MARKS) for s in students) / len(students)))

from collections import namedtuple

N = int(input())
cols = input().split()
Student = namedtuple('Student', cols)
students = [Student(*input().split()) for _ in range(N)]
print("{:.2f}".format(sum(float(s.MARKS) for s in students) / N))

from __future__ import print_function
from collections import namedtuple

N = int(input())
marks = namedtuple('marks',input())

total = 0.0
for i in range(N):
    total += int(marks(*input().split()).MARKS)

print(total/N)

from __future__ import print_function
from collections import namedtuple

N = int(input())
marks = namedtuple('marks', input())

total = 0.0
for i in range(N):
    total += int(marks(*input().split()).MARKS)
